property.name: dfs.namenode.name.dir
property.description: Path on the local filesystem where the NameNode stores the namespace and transaction logs

property.name: dfs.datanode.data.dir
property.description: Comma separated list of paths on the local filesystem where DataNode stores blocks

property.name: dfs.replication
property.description: Default block replication. Set to 1 for single-node setup

property.name: dfs.blocksize
property.description: The default block size for new files (128MB)

property.name: dfs.webhdfs.enabled
property.description: Enable WebHDFS (REST API) in NameNode and DataNode

property.name: dfs.permissions.enabled
property.description: If true, enable permission checking in HDFS

property.name: dfs.namenode.http-address
property.description: The address and port the NameNode web UI listens on

property.name: dfs.datanode.http.address
property.description: The datanode http server address and port

property.name: dfs.datanode.ipc.address
property.description: The datanode ipc server address and port

property.name: dfs.datanode.address
property.description: The datanode server address and port for data transfer
